sources.title: Woman Obsessed (1959)
sources.description: After her husband dies in a fire, a woman (Susan Hayward) is left to tend for her young son and the family farm on her own. Soon, she takes in a drifting handyman, they fall in love, and a resentment begins to build between the son and his new "step-father" who treats the boy harshly on purpose to prepare him for life on the frontier. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/woman-obsessed-1959/

metadata.Plot: After her husband dies in a fire, a woman is left to tend for her young son and the family farm on her own. Soon, she takes in a drifting handyman, they fall in love, and a resentment begins to build between the son and his new "step-father" who treats the boy harshly on purpose.
metadata.Actors: Susan Hayward, Stephen Boyd, Barbara Nichols
